content: create a set of 2 4 6 coasters by knitting in the round using steek panels between each colorwork coaster after binding off secure the steek panels with a running back stitch cut along the center steek stitch and block the coasters voila a set of coasters mc 2 coasters - 20g 4 coasters - 40g 6 coasters 60g cc 2 coasters - 10g 4 coasters - 20g 6 coasters 30g
